plot: Homer doesn't like it when Barney quits drinking; Bart and Lisa get into trouble when they enter a photo contest for the new phone book cover.

Realising that,as the town drunk,he has become a laughing stock,Barney quits drinking and takes up helicopter flying lessons. Lisa and Bart,meanwhile,aim to get their photos on the cover of the new phone book and have a photo session on Mount Springfield,where they accidentally start a forest fire. Fortunately the newly sober Barney,along with a drunk Homer,rescue them in the helicopter.—don @ minifie-1
